name: RECOFREEZE AL® 50/50
description: RECOFREEZE AL® 50/50 is a premixed, ready to use, pH neutral heat transfer fluid specifically designed for use in aluminum boiler and heat exchanger systems. It is especially suited to combat acidic corrosion of aluminum and other system metals utilizing a proprietary combination of corrosion inhibitors in a blend of virgin propylene glycol and high quality de-ionized water. The additive system used is free of amine, borate, nitrate, nitrite, phosphate or silicate and formulated to provide corrosion protection to copper, solder, brass, steel, cast iron and aluminum components.
